title: ICE: `debuginfo: unexpected type in type_di_node()`

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `rustc -Cdebuginfo=2 --crate-type lib` ```Rust #![feature(type_alias_impl_trait)] use std::fmt::Debug; type Foo = impl Debug; static FOO1: Foo = 22_u32; ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (1d7d82472 2023-06-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1d7d82472617a4a0fea59c7e239c8a48c8ac5c34 commit-date: 2023-06-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/debuginfo/metadata.rs:462:14: debuginfo: unexpected type in type_di_node(): Foo thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/1d7d82472617a4a0fea59c7e239c8a48c8ac5c34/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1650:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f162fd68821 -
